akn:section.akn:heading: Annuities in addition to other payments

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1441. Annuities in addition to other payments An annuity under this subchapter is in addition to any pension or other payment to which the beneficiary is entitled under any other provision of law, and may not be considered as income under any law administered by the Department of Veterans Affairs. (Aug. 10, 1956, ch. 1041, 70A Stat. 111; Pub. L. 85–857, § 13(v)(1), Sept. 2, 1958, 72 Stat. 1266; Pub. L. 85–861, § 1(31B), Sept. 2, 1958, 72 Stat. 1452; Pub.
